title: No sound in launcher, but in game.
body: I have sound when I am in game but the other sounds like when you log in and the main menu there is none.

replies.body:
This is an interesting issue. Can you check to see if your sounds settings in-client are set to values other than low? Here's a screenshot to assist you:

(Click to enlarge)
http://imgur.com/a/U0sBV

Additionally, you may have the launcher/client muted in your windows volume mixer. You can generally get to this by right clicking on your speaker icon in the notification tray (where time and date are on the right side of the task bar) and selecting **'Open volume mixer'**.

Here's what your Mixer should look like normally:

(Click to enlarge)
http://imgur.com/a/6xdo3

Let me know if this helped or if you have any questions.
I've done both of those things(looking at other threads with this issue) and it isn't the problem.

In that case, I suggest [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with our tech specialists so they can investigate further. In addition, you can attach a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) with your request to expedite service.

Let me know if you have any additional questions.
